00002  * Project: BaBar detector at the SLAC PEP-II B-factory

00007  * Description:
00008  *   Class for a BifurGauss pdf with it's own variable definition
00009  *   To be used in conjunction with RooFitCore/Models.

00011  *   18-Mar-2002 WW Created initial version
00012  *   28-Mar-2002 WW add dependents(), delete generate()

00014  *                  normalization problem in RooBifurGauss is solved.
00015  *
00016  * Copyright (C) 2002 University of California and SLAC
00017  *****************************************************************************/

00064 void BdkPdfBifurGauss::init(const char * theName,
00065                             const char * theDesc,
00066                             RooRealVar & dependent) {
00067     baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00068     setDependent(dependent);
00069     initParameters();
00070 }
00071 
00072 void BdkPdfBifurGauss::setDependent(RooRealVar & dependent) {
00073     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00074     _dependent = &dependent;
00075 }
00076   
00077 void BdkPdfBifurGauss::initParameters() {
00078     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00079     
00080     // Now define the RooVars. The default values are those appropriate
00081     // for missing mass: 
00082     _mean = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".mean" ,"mean", 1);
00083     _sigl = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".sigl" ,"sig left" , 1);
00084     _sigr = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".sigr" ,"sig right", 1);
00085     
00086     // Initial errors should be much less than an MeV to be useful for mRec:
00087     _mean->setConstant(kFALSE);
00088     _sigl->setConstant(kFALSE);
00089     _sigr->setConstant(kFALSE);
00090     _mean->setError(0.1);
00091     _sigl->setError(0.1);
00092     _sigr->setError(0.1);    
00093 }
00094  
00095 void BdkPdfBifurGauss::createPdf() {
00096   
00097     RooBifurGauss *f = 
00098         new RooBifurGauss(TString(GetName())+".pdf","Bifur Gaussian",
00099                           *_dependent,*_mean,*_sigl,*_sigr);
00100 
00101     // 
00102     // ww 08/16/2002
00103     // Force numerical integration for RooBifurGauss until 
00104     // normalization problem in RooBifurGauss is solved.
00105     //
00106     // fw 03/01/2006
00107     // Seems to be fixed now
00108     //    f->forceNumInt(kTRUE);
00109     //    cout << "BdkPdfBifurGauss::createPdf: forcing numerical integration "
00110     //         << "for RooBifurGauss! (temp. fix)" << endl;
00111     //
00112     _thePdf = f;
00113     setIsValid(kTRUE);
00114 }
00115 
00116 RooArgSet BdkPdfBifurGauss::dependents() {
00117 //
00118 // Get dependents.
00119 //
00120     
00121     return RooArgSet(*_dependent);
00122 }

00124 void BdkPdfBifurGauss::linkParameters(const BdkPdfBifurGauss & pdf2) {
00125     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00126     linkParameters(pdf2._mean , pdf2._sigl, pdf2._sigr);
00127 }
00128 
00129 void BdkPdfBifurGauss::linkParameters(RooRealVar *mean,
00130                                       RooRealVar *sigl, RooRealVar *sigr) {
00131     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00132     if ( mean != 0 ) {_mean = mean;}
00133     if ( sigl != 0 ) {_sigl = sigl;} 
00134     if ( sigr != 0 ) {_sigr = sigr;}
00135 }
